features.name: Construct Resilience
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to resist being poisoned or diseased.

features.name: Integrated Tools
features.description: You can spend a Hope to produce a tool needed for a task from your mechanical body.

features.name: Draconic Resistance
features.description: Choose a damage type. You have resistance to that damage type.

features.name: Wings
features.description: You can glide, falling safely from any height and moving up to your move distance horizontally.

features.name: Stonecunning
features.description: You have advantage on rolls related to stonework, mining, and underground environments.

features.name: Dwarven Resilience
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to resist being poisoned.

features.name: Fey Ancestry
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to resist being charmed or put to sleep.

features.name: Keen Senses
features.description: You have advantage on Instinct rolls to notice hidden creatures or objects.

features.name: Flight
features.description: You can fly up to your move distance each turn.

features.name: Pixie Dust
features.description: Once per long rest, you can grant an ally the ability to fly for one scene.

features.name: Nature Walker
features.description: Difficult terrain made of natural materials doesn't slow your movement.

features.name: Forest Magic
features.description: You know one Sage domain card of your choice at Level 1.

features.name: Gentle Giant
features.description: You have advantage on rolls to calm or befriend animals.

features.name: Powerful Build
features.description: You count as one size larger for carrying capacity and lifting.

features.name: Spore Cloud
features.description: Once per short rest, you can release a cloud of spores that obscures vision in a Close area.

features.name: Fungal Network
features.description: You can communicate with other Fungrils telepathically within Far range.

features.name: Shell Defense
features.description: You can retreat into your shell, gaining +2 armor but becoming immobile.

features.name: Aquatic
features.description: You can breathe underwater and have a swim speed equal to your move distance.

features.name: Towering Strength
features.description: You have advantage on Strength rolls to lift, push, or break objects.

features.name: Giant Reach
features.description: Your melee attacks have +1 range increment.

features.name: Surefooted
features.description: You ignore disadvantage on Agility rolls.

features.name: Danger Sense
features.description: Once per rest, mark a Stress to force an adversary to reroll an attack against you or an ally within Very Close range.

features.name: Lucky
features.description: When you roll with Fear, you can reroll one die once.

features.name: Nimble
features.description: You can move through spaces occupied by larger creatures.

features.name: Versatile
features.description: You gain +1 to two different experiences of your choice.

features.name: Adaptable
features.description: You gain one additional Foundation card from any domain at character creation.

features.name: Fire Resistance
features.description: You have resistance to fire damage.

features.name: Hellish Rebuke
features.description: When you take damage, you can spend a Hope to deal 1d6 fire damage to the attacker.

features.name: Feline Agility
features.description: You have advantage on Agility rolls to balance, jump, or climb.

features.name: Claws
features.description: Your unarmed strikes deal 1d6 physical damage instead of 1d4.

features.name: Sturdy
features.description: When you have 1 Hit Point remaining, attacks against you have disadvantage.

features.name: Tusks
features.description: When you succeed on an attack against a target within Melee range, you can spend a Hope to gore the target with your tusks, dealing an extra 1d6 damage.

features.name: Amphibious
features.description: You can breathe air and water, and have a swim speed equal to your move distance.

features.name: Standing Leap
features.description: Your jump distance is doubled without a running start.

features.name: Prehensile Tail
features.description: You can use your tail to hold and manipulate objects, leaving your hands free.

features.name: Tree Climber
features.description: You have a climb speed equal to your move distance when climbing trees or similar structures.
